name: test_cypress_visor
description: Pruebas e2e para el visor de IDECABA

scripts.test:allure: npm run allure:clear && npm run cy:run && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:allure:qa: allure:clear && npm run cy:run:qa && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:allure:hml: npm run allure:clear && npm run cy:run:hml && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
